descriptionSet.description: Eight matchbox covers can be seen in this image. The first shows the number 777, the second a horsehead, the third a travelling bag, the fourth a night-sky, the fifth a rising sun, the sixth a black farmer fighting with a leopard, the seventh playing card logos and the eighth the head of a camel.

inscription.text: (First row) From Left. 1. Lucky Seven. Impregnated. 777. Quality. Wimco. Safty Matches. Made in India. 2.The Horse Head. Wimco. Made in India. Safty Matches. (second row) 1.The Esavi India Match. Factory Calcutta. 2. Id-Ka-Chand. Safty Matches. Made in Pakistan . (third row) 1. Rising Sun Matches. Made in India. The Western India Match Company Ltd. 2.Cheeta Fight. Wimco. Safty Matches. Made in India. (fourth row) 1. Tekka. Made in India. Wimco. Safty Match. 2. Camel Head. Deluxe Quality. Damp Proof. Safty Matches. Deluxe Quality.
(second row) 2. عید کاچاند (forth row) 1. ADD TEXT HERE

location.name: Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art
Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art

description-en: Eight matchbox covers can be seen in this image. The first shows the number 777, the second a horsehead, the third a travelling bag, the fourth a night-sky, the fifth a rising sun, the sixth a black farmer fighting with a leopard, the seventh playing card logos and the eighth the head of a camel.
